sentences.en: Boxes are stacked in every nook and cranny at the factory.
sentences.cn: 盒子叠放在工厂的各个角落。

sentences.en: He had worked on the factory floor for 16 years.
He's got a bee in his bonnet about factory farming.
sentences.cn: 他满脑子都是工厂化养殖的事儿。

sentences.en: I'm a factory worker who grossed £12,900 last year.
sentences.cn: 我是个工厂工人，去年的总收入为12,900英镑。

sentences.en: The company has recently moved into a new purpose-built factory.
sentences.cn: 该公司最近搬进了一家专门建造的新工厂。

sentences.en: The company originally intended to reopen the factory with non-union workers.
sentences.cn: 公司原打算雇用不属于工会的工人重新开工。

sentences.en: The demand generated by one factory required the construction of another.
sentences.cn: 一家工厂产生的需求使得必须再建造一家工厂。

sentences.en: The factory may make as few as 1,500 cars this year.
sentences.cn: 今年，工厂生产的小轿车可能只有1,500辆。

sentences.en: The factory was due to shut for the festive period.
The factory's workforce has dwindled from over 4,000 to a few hundred.
sentences.cn: 工厂雇员总数已经从4,000多人减少到几百人。

sentences.en: The first three models are being manufactured at the factory in Ashton-under-Lyne.
sentences.cn: 最初的3种型号在阿什顿安德莱恩的工厂生产。

sentences.en: The girl had found out about the goings-on in the factory.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩已经发现了工厂里的勾当。

sentences.en: The signboard outside the factory read "baby milk plant".
sentences.cn: 工厂外的招牌上写着“婴儿乳品厂”。

sentences.en: The smell of sawdust and glue pervaded the factory.
sentences.cn: 工厂里弥漫着锯屑和胶水的气味。

sentences.en: They arrived to clock on and found the factory gates locked.
sentences.cn: 他们到了工厂准备打卡上班，却发现大门没开。

words.tran_cn: 因素；要素；[物] 因数；代理人
[数] 因子分解，[数] 因式分解；保付代理
把…因素包括进去（factor的ing形式）
把…作为因素计入；代理经营；把…分解成

phrases.tran_cn: 电子厂，电子工厂；无线电元件厂

trans.tran_en: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines
a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines
